tooltipInfo.salesHorizonInfo: Specifies how many prior months are included in the Sales analysis (Un-/Weighted Sales Mix). Typically [4, 6].
tooltipInfo.projectionHorizonInfo: Specifies how many future months are included in the Inventory analysis (Current/Projected Mix). Typically [3, 4].
tooltipInfo.mixThresholdInfo: All rows in the data table having a Weighted Sales Mix less than tis value will be highlighted in orange.

conflictNotification.recordUpdatedConflict: The {{item}} you are editing has been updated by someone else. Click 'Ok' to refresh the latest data and make your changes again.
conflictNotification.offlineUpdateConflict: The following {{item}} could not be updated because another user has edited {{pronoun}} while you were offline.
conflictNotification.offlineDeleteConflict: The following {{item}} could not be deleted because another user has deleted {{pronoun}} while you were offline.
